title: [Lupus erythematosus. 2. Systemic Lupus erythematosus: antibody symptomatology, other laboratory evidence, diagnosis, course and prognosis; discoid Lupus erythematosus; drug induced Lupus].
summary: The AA. in this note II report the most recent acquisitions about the clinical features, hematology and serology of Systemic Lupus Erythematosus. Moreover describe the main characteristics of Discoid Lupus Erythematosus and of Lupus due t â€¦
abstract: The AA. in this note II report the most recent acquisitions about the clinical features, hematology and serology of Systemic Lupus Erythematosus. Moreover describe the main characteristics of Discoid Lupus Erythematosus and of Lupus due to drugs.
